snippet: The appearance is part of a publicity campaign in advance of Mr. Rose's 12-night run at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas, which starts Oct. 31.
abstract: The appearance is part of a publicity campaign in advance of Mr. Rose's 12-night run at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas, which starts Oct. 31.

headline.main: Axl Rose to Appear on Jimmy Kimmel Show
headline.print_headline: Axl Rose to Appear On ‘Jimmy Kimmel’
